abstract: The National Endowment for the Arts made sweeping cuts in its support of established PBS shows under the 2012 Arts in Media grants when it announced them on Wednesday morning.
snippet: The National Endowment for the Arts made sweeping cuts in its support of established PBS shows under the 2012 Arts in Media grants when it announced them on Wednesday morning.
lead_paragraph: 2:48 p.m. | Updated The National Endowment for the Arts made sweeping cuts in its support of established PBS shows in the 2012 Arts in Media grants, which were announced Wednesday morning. Instead, the endowment awarded large grants to an array of gaming and Web-based projects.

headline.main: Arts Endowment Trims Support for PBS Shows
